definitions.definition: ( informal ) A pike ( type of fish ) .

main_definition: ( informal ) A pike ( type of fish ) .

definitions.definition: An itinerant person, especially one of Romani or Irish Traveller heritage.
A working-class (often underclass) person with negative qualities stereotypically ascribed to Romani people and Irish Travellers, regardless of ethnicity.

main_definition: ( UK , Ireland , ethnic slur , offensive ) An itinerant person, especially one of Romani or Irish Traveller heritage.
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Ireland , derogatory , offensive ) A working-class (often underclass) person with negative qualities stereotypically ascribed to Romani people and Irish Travellers, regardless of ethnicity.
